fields.name: Adjective
fields.description: Describes a noun, e.g., big, old, green, first.

fields.name: Adposition
fields.description: Prepositions and postpositions, e.g., in, to, during.

fields.name: Adverb
fields.description: Modifies a verb, adjective, or other adverb, e.g., very, well, tomorrow.

fields.name: Auxiliary
fields.description: Auxiliary verbs, e.g., is, has, will.

fields.name: Coordinating Conjunction
fields.description: Links words or phrases, e.g., and, or, but.

fields.name: Determiner
fields.description: Introduces a noun, e.g., a, an, the.

fields.name: Interjection
fields.description: Expresses emotion, e.g., oh, wow, oops.

fields.name: Noun
fields.description: Person, place, thing, or idea, e.g., cat, company, music.

fields.name: Particle
fields.description: Function words that must accompany other words, e.g., not, to (as in to go).

fields.name: Pronoun
fields.description: Replaces a noun, e.g., he, she, they.

fields.name: Proper Noun
fields.description: Specific names, e.g., John, London, UN.

fields.name: Subordinating Conjunction
fields.description: Introduces a subordinate clause, e.g., if, while, that.

fields.name: Verb
fields.description: Actions or states, e.g., run, is, seem.
